snippet.title: PBA Pro Bowling Full Trailer - Available October 22
snippet.description:
For the first time in decades, there will be an official PBA Tour video game available on console. PBA Pro Bowling will be launching October 22 on the Nintendo Switch, PS4, Xbox One, and Steam/PC. 

The game includes top PBA pros, a deep career mode with over 100 tournaments, authentic oil patterns, the most advanced bowling physics ever in a video game, commentary from Rob Stone and PBA legend Randy Pedersen and online play. PBA Pro Bowling has everything a bowling fan would want and it’s just $19.99 at launch.
